validation.email-start-with-char: Email should not start with number
validation.eight-char: Password must be at least 8 characters long
validation.one-uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
validation.one-lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
validation.one-special: Password must contain at least one special character
validation.one-number: Password must contain at least one numeric digit
validation.terms: You must accept the terms and conditions
validation.fullNameMin: Name must be at least 3 characters
validation.fullNameNoNum: Name must not start with a number
validation.validPhone: Please enter a valid phone number
validation.nationalNum: National personal number must be exactly 10 digits
validation.personalInterests: Personal interests must include at least one interest
validation.linkedinUrl: URL must be a LinkedIn profile link
validation.facebookUrl: URL must be a Facebook profile link
validation.xUrl: URL must be a X.com profile link
validation.instagramUrl: URL must be a Instagram profile link
validation.youtubeUrl: URL must be a Youtube profile link
validation.valueNoNum: Value must not start with a number
validation.yearsOfExpNum: Years of experience must be a number
validation.yearsOfExpMax: Years of experience must be 20 or less
validation.valueMin3Letters: Value should be at least 3 letters
validation.expertiseOnlyLetters: Areas of expertise must contain only letters and spaces
validation.methodOfComm: Method of communication must include at least one method
validation.availabilityMin3: Availability must be at least 3 characters
validation.mentorshipGoalsMin10: Mentorship goals must be at least 10 characters
validation.maxNumRange: Maximum number must be between 1 and 50
validation.previousMentoringMin5: Previous mentoring experience must be at least 5 characters
validation.previousMentoringNoNum: Previous mentoring experience must not contain numbers or special characters
validation.addressMin5: Address must contain at least 5 characters
validation.uploadCert: You should upload at least one professional certification
validation.confirmMentorship: You must confirm that you are interested in providing mentorship
validation.message: Message must be at least 10 characters
